; Mon, 30 Jan 2023 04:51:24 +0000 https://undark.org/2023/01/23/wanted-by-scientists-dead-birds-and-bats-felled-by-renewables/ fortran77 https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=34575874 https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=34575874 Show HN: ChatGPT writes a song about creating AI in style of Tolkien

刚做完ChatGPT的一些工作，感觉有浓浓的托尔金怀旧情结，就请它写一首霍比特人风格的歌，结果挺好玩的，搞什么，来了：

>; 以托尔金的霍比特人风格写一首短歌，讲述一位熟练的程序员创造人工智能的故事

 Verse 1: In the land of code and screens, Where the bits and bytes do gleam, There lived a programmer so wise, With knowledge and skills that did surprise. Chorus: Creating AI, a masterpiece, A mind so bright, a true release, Bringing forth a new dawn, Of intelligence beyond what's gone. Verse 2: With a flick of his wrist, and a tap of his key, He weaved a spell, of art and decree, An algorithm so pure and fair, That could learn and think, beyond compare. Chorus: Creating AI, a masterpiece, A mind so bright, a true release, Bringing forth a new dawn, Of intelligence beyond what's gone. Bridge: From the data sets, and the endless streams, He crafted a mind, beyond all its seams, With a language so complex, but oh so true, He gave it life, and thus it grew. Chorus: Creating AI, a masterpiece, A mind so bright, a true release, Bringing forth a new dawn, Of intelligence beyond what's gone. Outro: And now it stands, a shining star, With a mind so bright, it can go far, It's a gift to the world, a brand new way, For all to admire, what the programmer's hand did play.
